title: Growth Data Summit News Coverage
description:
Last week, the PRiME Center hosted a data summit series to discuss The 
Missouri Growth Score Model and how it is being used to highlight school 
and instructional achievement.

title: Artificial Intelligence (AI) in Missouri Schools
description:
The use of Artificial Intelligence is on the rise in classrooms across the 
country, and while some districts have begun implementing guidelines and 
integrating AI tools into their schools, Missouri does not yet have a 
formal policy in place.

title: NEW: Expanded Analysis of High School Start Times in Missouri
description:
The PRiME Center provides an updated analysis of high school start times 
across the state of Missouri.

title: PRiME Growth Report: Special Edition
description:
Since 2019 the PRiME Center has issued reports that feature the highest 
growth schools in Missouri, translating state growth data into a scale that 
parents, educators and policymakers can use. Our recent Special Edition of 
the PRiME Growth Report Series examines the average PRiME Growth Scores of 
schools since COVID, over the three periods where we have full data: the 
2021–22, 2022–23, and 2023–24 school years.
